For common etiological agents of Healthcare Associated Ventriculitis, see Annexure B.2.5 
Additional Information:  
• 
May need intra ventricular antimicrobial therapy in severe cases. 
• 
Factors which increase the risk of post neuro-surgical infections:  
CSF leak, CSF drainage, prolonged duration of surgery (> 4 hours), venous sinus surgery, 
implantation of foreign materials, posterior approach to spinal surgery, diabetes, tobacco 
smoking, previous neuro-surgeries, hair shaving in ventriculo-peritoneal shunt placement.
